1:
echo "Checking database connectivity..."
until nc -zv cnpg-mastodon-rw.productivity.svc.cluster.local 5432; do
  echo "Database is not ready yet. Retrying in 5 seconds..."
  sleep 5
done
echo "Database is ready. Proceeding with startup."

0:
[INPUT]
  name tail
  alias kubernetes
  path /var/log/containers/*.log
  parser containerd
  tag kubernetes.*

[FILTER]
  name kubernetes
  alias kubernetes
  match kubernetes.*
  buffer_size 0
  merge_log on

  kube_tag_prefix kubernetes.var.log.containers.
  k8s-logging.parser on
  k8s-logging.exclude on
  namespace_labels off
  annotations on

[FILTER]
  name modify
  match kubernetes.*
  add source kubernetes

[FILTER]
  name nest
  match *
  wildcard pod_name
  operation lift
  nested_under kubernetes
  add_prefix kubernetes_

[OUTPUT]
  Name loki
  Match kubernetes.*
  host loki-headless.observability.svc.cluster.local
  port 3100
  uri /loki/api/v1/push
  line_format json
  labels job=fluent-bit, source=$source, namespace=$kubernetes_namespace_name

1:
provider = "google"
auth_logging = true
cookie_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
cookie_httponly = true
cookie_name = "_john_family_oauth"
cookie_refresh = "1h"
cookie_samesite = "lax"
cookie_secure = true
email_domains = [ "${FAMILY_DOMAIN}" ]
pass_access_token = true
pass_authorization_header = true
pass_basic_auth = false
request_logging = true
session_store_type = "cookie"
silence_ping_logging = true
set_authorization_header = true
set_xauthrequest = true
skip_jwt_bearer_tokens = true
skip_provider_button = true
ssl_insecure_skip_verify = false
standard_logging = true
upstreams = [ "static://200" ]
whitelist_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
footer = "For Internal Family Use Only"
reverse_proxy = "true"
redirect_url = "https://sso.${FAMILY_DOMAIN}/oauth2/callback"

echo port=$DNSMASQ__PORT > /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo address=$DNSMASQ__ADDRESS >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo user=$DNSMASQ__USER >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo group=$DNSMASQ__GROUP >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo "log-queries" >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
cat /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf
